div.p: SUMMER VACATION, BEACH, READ SOMETHING YOU’RE GOING TO LEARN
SOMETHING FROM. IT DOESN’T HAVE TO BE MY BOOKS,
BUT, YOU KNOW, LEARN SOMETHING. TIP OF THE DAY, DOING SOMETHING
NOBLE ON THE FOURTH OF JULY. TRUTH IS WE’RE LUCKY TO LIVE IN
THIS COUNTRY EVEN IF IT’S DIVIDED RIGHT NOW.
OUT ON LONG ISLAND WHERE I LIVE THERE,’S A DENTIST NAMED JOHN
PETERSON, HE’S TREATING SICK VETERANS FREE.
AND THE KIDS WILL BE SELLING LEMONADE AT THE YMCA THERE FOR
GETTING HIGH-TECH WHEELCHAIRS TO WOURNDED VETS.
THE PERFORMANCE SYSTEMS GROUPS HAS DONATED A TRAP CHAIR THAT’S
WORTH 15,000 BUCKS. A LOT OF CELEBRITIES ARE DOING
THAT. ALL OF US CAN DO SOMETHING TO
HELP OTHER AMERICANS THIS FOURTH OF JULY.
AND AS JOHN BELUSHI ONCE SAID. >> LET’S GO!
